_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_filterRecords
_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GSS_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000ee54-fb4d-8000-9e2f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!returnedVendorsCount: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!returnedVendors),
    0,
    length(ri!returnedVendors)
  ),
  local!returnedVendorsCountWithEmptyCards: a!match(
    value: local!returnedVendorsCount,
    whenTrue: fv!value < 3,
    then: 3,
    default: local!returnedVendorsCount
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardGroupLayout"(
    cardWidth: if(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"(
        {
          "DESKTOP_NARROW",
          "DESKTOP",
          "DESKTOP_WIDE"
        }
      ),
      "NARROW_PLUS",
      "NARROW"
    ),
    marginBelow: "NONE",
    spacing: "DENSE",
    cards: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: enumerate(
        local!returnedVendorsCountWithEmptyCards
      ) + 1,
      expression: if(
        ri!isSLGToggleOn,
        rule!AS_GSS_CRD_selectVendorFromVM_StateAndLocal(
          bundle: ri!bundle,
          existingEvaluationVendors: ri!existingEvaluationVendors,
          currentVendorCard: index(ri!returnedVendors, fv!index, null),
          selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
          isVmPage: ri!isVmPage,
          allVmVendorIdentifiers: ri!allVmVendorIdentifiers,
          currentVendorSource: cons!AS_GSS_TXT_VENDOR_SOURCE_MANUAL
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_CRD_selectVendorFromVM_Federal(
          bundle: ri!bundle,
          existingEvaluationVendors: ri!existingEvaluationVendors,
          currentVendorCard: index(ri!returnedVendors, fv!index, null),
          selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
          isVmPage: ri!isVmPage,
          allVmVendorIdentifiers: ri!allVmVendorIdentifiers,
          currentVendorSource: cons!AS_GSS_TXT_VENDOR_SOURCE_MANUAL
        )
      )
    ),
    showWhen: a!defaultValue(ri!showWhen, false())
  )
)

    ),

    ),

  )
)

      ri!selectedVendors,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,

    )

  a!flatten(

        isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
        data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
          records: fv!item,
          modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD(
            recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
              nullableValue: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
              replacementValue: true()
            ),
            recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents],
              expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
                recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD,
                modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
                createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
                createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
                modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
                modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
                isDeletedField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted,
                data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
                  records: fv!item,
                  modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD(
                    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
                      nullableValue: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted],
                      replacementValue: false()
                    ),

_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

{
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headingField"(
    text: "Documents",
    size: "SMALL",
    headingTag: "H3",
    fontWeight: "BOLD",
    marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS"
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    marginBelow: "LESS",
    value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: "Upload documents and map them to at least one Evaluation factor.",
      size: "SMALL",
      color: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
        brandingKey: "GrayThree",
        useSuiteBranding: true
      )
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(
    buttons: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
        label: "Upload",
        icon: "upload",
        value: true,
        saveInto: { a!save(ri!isUploadInProgress, true()) },
        size: "SMALL",
        color: "SECONDARY",
        accessibilityText: if(
          or(
            ri!isUploadInProgress = true(),
            ri!isImportInProgress = true()
          ),
          {},
          "Upload documents and map them to at least one Evaluation factor."
        ),
        disabled: or(
          ri!isUploadInProgress = true(),
          ri!isImportInProgress = true()
        )
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
        label: "Import From Opportunity",
        icon: "file-import",
        value: true,
        saveInto: {
          a!save(
            ri!selectedVendorDocumentDataFromVM,
            rule!AS_GSS_mapDataFromVMToEvaluationDocumentRecord(
              solicitationNumber: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber],
              evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
              externalVendorId: ri!externalVendorId,
              startIndex: 1,
              batchSize: 1,
              version: 1
            ).data
          ),
          a!save(ri!isImportInProgress, true())
        },
        size: "SMALL",
        color: "SECONDARY",
        disabled: or(
          ri!isUploadInProgress = true(),
          ri!isImportInProgress = true(),
          ri!noDocToImport
        ),
        showWhen: ri!showImportFromOpportunity
      )
    },
    align: "START"
  )
}

_a-0000ed2d-b9af-8000-9de8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GAM_R_State_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GAM_R_State_SYNCEDRECORD.stateCode,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!stateCode,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!stateCode)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GAM_R_State_SYNCEDRECORD.stateId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!stateId,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!stateId)
    ),
    ri!additionalfilters
  },
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray({ ri!fields }),
  sort: a!defaultValue(
    ri!sortInfo,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS_GAM_R_State_SYNCEDRECORD.stateName,
      ascending: true
    )
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
)

_a-0000ee67-7064-8000-9e36-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isStateOrLocal: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!isStateOrLocal,
    default: false()
  ),
  a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
      expression: #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
        data: fv!item,
        index: "vendorDetails",
        value: if(
          local!isStateOrLocal,
          rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
            value: fv!item.vendorDetails[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.stateAndLocalIdentifier],
            initialArray: ri!storedEvaluationVendors[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.stateAndLocalIdentifier],
            finalArray: ri!storedEvaluationVendors,
            isRemove: false()
          ),
          rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
            value: fv!item.vendorDetails[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.federalIdentifier],
            initialArray: ri!storedEvaluationVendors[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.federalIdentifier],
            finalArray: ri!storedEvaluationVendors,
            isRemove: false()
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed40-2ea9-8000-9dec-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_constructEvaluationVendorForSelection
_a-0000ed40-2ea9-8000-9dec-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(value: ri!vendorMap),
  {},
  recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD(
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName: ri!vendorMap.vendorLegalName,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName:ri!vendorMap.doingBusinessAs,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode: ri!vendorMap.cageCode,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId: ri!vendorMap.uniqueEntityId,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin: ri!vendorMap.tin,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein: ri!vendorMap.fein,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vin: ri!vendorMap.vin,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status: ri!vendorMap.registrationStatusId,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate: ri!vendorMap.registrationExpirationDate,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: true(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_GSS,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isUpdateRequired: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents: null,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.submittedDate: null,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.gsmVendorRefId: ri!vendorMap.vendorId,
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.address: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!vendorMap.physicalAndMailingAddress,
      expression: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD(
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.addressType: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
          value: fv!item.addressType,
          initialArray: ri!vendorAddressTypes[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Data_SYNCEDRECORD.refLabel],
          finalArray: ri!vendorAddressTypes[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Data_SYNCEDRECORD.refDataId],
          isRemove: false()
        ),
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1: fv!item.addressLine1,
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2: fv!item.addressLine2,
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity: fv!item.city,
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
          value: fv!item.stateOrProvinceCode,
          initialArray: ri!refStates[recordType!AS_GAM_R_State_SYNCEDRECORD.stateCode],
          finalArray: ri!refStates[recordType!AS_GAM_R_State_SYNCEDRECORD.stateId],
          isRemove: false()
        ),
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
          value: fv!item.countryCode,
          initialArray: ri!refCountries[recordType!AS_GAM_R_Country_SYNCEDRECORD.samGovCode],
          finalArray: ri!refCountries[recordType!AS_GAM_R_Country_SYNCEDRECORD.countryId],
          isRemove: false()
        ),
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode: fv!item.zipCode,
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt: fv!item.zipCodeExt,
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode: fv!item.foreignPostalCode,
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: true(),
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.state: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
          value: fv!item.stateOrProvinceCode,
          initialArray: ri!refStates[recordType!AS_GAM_R_State_SYNCEDRECORD.stateCode],
          finalArray: ri!refStates,
          isRemove: false()
        ),
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.country: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
          value: fv!item.countryCode,
          initialArray: ri!refCountries[recordType!AS_GAM_R_Country_SYNCEDRECORD.samGovCode],
          finalArray: ri!refCountries,
          isRemove: false()
        ),
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.referenceAddressType: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
          value: fv!item.addressType,
          initialArray: ri!vendorAddressTypes[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Data_SYNCEDRECORD.refLabel],
          finalArray: ri!vendorAddressTypes,
          isRemove: false()
        )
      )
    ),
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessTypes: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!vendorMap.business.businessTypeMapping,
      expression: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD(
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode: fv!item.businessTypeRefId
      )
    ),
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.federalIdentifier: concat(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: upper(ri!vendorMap.uniqueEntityId),
        replacementValue: "N/A"
      ),
      "|",
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: upper(ri!vendorMap.cageCode),
        replacementValue: "N/A"
      )
    ),
    recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.stateAndLocalIdentifier: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: upper(ri!vendorMap.tin),
      replacementValue: "N/A"
    )
  )
)

        ),

      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CRD_selectVendorFromGSM_Federal(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        existingVendors: ri!existingVendors,
        currentVendor: rule!AS_GSS_UT_constructEvaluationVendorForSelection(
          vendorMap: fv!item,
          evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
          vendorAddressTypes: ri!vendorAddressTypes,
          refStates: ri!refStates,
          refCountries: ri!refCountries
        ),
        selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
        currentVendorInMap: fv!item,
        refCountries: ri!refCountries,
        allVmVendorIdentifiers: ri!allVmVendorIdentifiers
      )
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_footerForSearchResultsFromSuite(
    manualVendorMap: ri!manualVendorMap,
    bundle: ri!bundle,
    triggerRefresh: {},
    isCreateVendorManually: ri!isCreateVendorManually,
    searchResultsMap: ri!searchResultsMap,
    searchAndFiltersMap: ri!searchAndFiltersMap,
    showWhen: and(
      toboolean(ri!searchAndFiltersMap.isSearched) = true(),

_a-0001ed6e-54f1-8000-9df6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CO_INP_dateTimeFieldCustom
_a-0001ed6e-54f1-8000-9df6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!userValue: local(
    a!defaultValue(value: ri!value, default: {})
  ),
  local!date: todate(local!userValue),
  local!time: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!value),
    null,
    time(
      hour(local!userValue),
      minute(local!userValue),
      second(local!userValue)
    )
  ),
  local!timeSlots: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_sortArrayDistinct(
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      array: append(
        a!flatten(
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: enumerate(24) + 1,
            expression: a!localVariables(
              local!currentHour: fv!item,
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                items: enumerate(60 / ri!timeIntervals) * ri!timeIntervals,
                expression: time(local!currentHour, fv!item, 00)
              )
            )
          )
        ),
        local!time
      )
    ),
    ascending: true()
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!dateLabel,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(dateTime: ri!value),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
      align: null
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
      spacing: a!defaultValue(value: ri!spacing, default: "DENSE"),
      items: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          width: "MINIMIZE",
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"(
            label: ri!dateLabel,
            labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
              label: ri!dateLabel,
              labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
              readOnly: false
            ),
            instructions: ri!instructions,
            helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
            value: local!date,
            saveInto: {
              a!save(
                ri!value,
                if(
                  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: save!value),
                  {},
                  gmt(
                    datetime(
                      year(save!value),
                      month(save!value),
                      day(save!value),
                      hour(
                        a!defaultValue(value: local!userValue, default: 00)
                      ),
                      minute(
                        a!defaultValue(value: local!userValue, default: 00)
                      ),
                      second(
                        a!defaultValue(value: local!userValue, default: 00)
                      )
                    )
                  )
                )
              ),
              ri!additionalSaves
            },
            showWhen: ri!showWhen,
            required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
            /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
            requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
              label: ri!dateLabel,
              requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
            ),
            readOnly: ri!readOnly,
            disabled: ri!disabled,
            validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
            validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
            accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          width: "MINIMIZE",
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
            label: ri!timeLabel,
            labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
              label: ri!timeLabel,
              labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
              readOnly: false
            ),
            instructions: ri!instructions,
            helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
            placeholder: ri!timePlaceholder,
            choiceLabels: local!timeSlots,
            choiceValues: local!timeSlots,
            value: local!time,
            saveInto: {
              a!save(
                ri!value,
                if(
                  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: save!value),
                  {},
                  gmt(
                    datetime(
                      year(local!userValue),
                      month(local!userValue),
                      day(local!userValue),
                      hour(save!value),
                      minute(save!value),
                      second(save!value)
                    )
                  )
                )
              ),
              ri!additionalSaves
            },
            showWhen: ri!showWhen,
            required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
            /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
            requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
              label: ri!timeLabel,
              requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
            ),
            disabled: or(
              ri!disabled,
              a!isNullOrEmpty(value: local!date)
            ),
            validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
            validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
            accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
          )
        )
      }
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed8a-02db-8000-9dfc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
  contents: a!localVariables(
    local!noDocToImport: a!refreshVariable(
      value: ri!totalDocsFromOpportunity = length(
        {
          rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
            records: ri!selectedVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents],
            field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId,
            values: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_VM
          )
        }
      ),
      refreshOnReferencedVarChange: true()
    ),
    {
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_displayVendorInformation(
        selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor,
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        isSLGToggleOn: ri!isSLGToggleOn
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_captureVendorInformation(
        selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor,
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        showWhen: true()
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_uploadOrImportVendorDocuments(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors,
        selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor,
        pendingUploadDocIds: ri!pendingUploadDocIds,
        uploadedTemporaryDocIds: ri!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
        isVmEnabled: ri!isVmEnabled,
        allDocsFromOpportunity: ri!allDocsFromOpportunity,
        selectedDocsForImportFromOpportunity: ri!selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity,
        selectedIndex: ri!selectedIndex,
        selectedRows: ri!selectedRows,
        noDocToImport: local!noDocToImport,
        isUploadInProgress: ri!isUploadInProgress,
        isImportInProgress: ri!isImportInProgress,
        defaultFactorId: ri!defaultFactorId
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_captureVendorPriceBreakup(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor
      )
    }
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen
)

_a-0000ed8a-02db-8000-9dfc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_displayDocumentName
_a-0000ed8a-02db-8000-9dfc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!document),
  {},
  a!match(
    value: ri!sourceApplicationId,
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_VM,
    then: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayVmDocumentName(
      documentName: ri!documentName,
      extension: ri!extension,
      version: ri!version,
      bundle: ri!bundle
    ),
    default: rule!AS_GSS_UT_findDocumentNameAndExtensionById(documetId: ri!document).nameWithExtension
  )
)

_a-0000ed49-6a91-8000-9dee-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UTIL_processDocumentName
_a-0000ed49-6a91-8000-9dee-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!hasNoExtension: search(".", ri!docName) = 0,
  local!namePart: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    ri!docName,
    regexsearch(
      pattern: ".*(?=\.)",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  local!extension: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    "",
    regexsearch(
      pattern: "[^\.]*$",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  a!map(
    nameWithExtension: concat(local!namePart, ".", local!extension),
    name: local!namePart,
    extension: local!extension
  )
)

_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getRefDataByTypes
_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:

cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000ed36-f3bd-8000-9dea-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_isActiveInSam
_a-0000ed36-f3bd-8000-9dea-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: null,
  whenTrue: and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!status),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!expirationDate)
  ),
  then: ri!status,
  whenTrue: and(
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!status),
      ri!status = cons!AS_GSS_SAM_GOV_TXT_STATUS_ACTIVE
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!expirationDate),
    todate(ri!expirationDate) >= today()
  ),
  then: cons!AS_GSS_SAM_GOV_TXT_STATUS_ACTIVE,
  whenTrue: or(
    and(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!expirationDate),
      todate(ri!expirationDate) < today()
    ),
    and(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!status),
      ri!status = cons!AS_GSS_SAM_GOV_TXT_STATUS_INACTIVE
    )
  ),
  then: cons!AS_GSS_SAM_GOV_TXT_STATUS_INACTIVE,
  default: null
)

a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isSLGToggleOn: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!isSLGToggleOn,
    replacementValue: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper()
  ),
  local!evaluationRecord: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluation(
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!evaluationId),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
    evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
    fields: {
      recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationTitle,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.folderId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationMethodId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.factorCount
    }
  ),
  local!vendorPagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
    startIndex: 1,
    batchSize: cons!AS_GSS_BATCH_SIZE_FOR_VENDOR_CARDS_IN_ADD_VENDOR
  ),
  local!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getCriteria(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!evaluationId),
    evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
    fields: {
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.factorNumber,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaName,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.isDefaultEntry,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive
    },
    sortInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.factorNumber,
      ascending: true()
    )
  ),
  local!defaultFactorId: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_BL_defaultFactorDocumentMapping(
      evaluation: local!evaluationRecord,
      evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: local!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: {
      local!evaluationRecord,
      local!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    }
  ),
  local!vendorInfo: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_mapDataFromVMToEvalVendorRecord(
      solicitationNumber: local!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber],
      startIndex: local!vendorPagingInfo.startIndex,
      batchSize: local!vendorPagingInfo.batchSize,
      version: 1,
      evaluationId: local!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
      defaultFactorId: local!defaultFactorId
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: local!vendorPagingInfo
  ),
  /*When no related opportunity is found for the evaluation, VM pages need not be included*/
  local!isVmEnabled: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!isVmEnabled,
    replacementValue: if(
      index(local!vendorInfo, "error", "") = cons!AS_GSS_VM_ERROR_CODE_NO_RELATED_OPPORTUNITY,
      false(),
      cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE
    )
  ),
  local!evaluationVendors: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendors(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!evaluationId),
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,

    ),

      if(
        local!isSLGToggleOn,
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.stateAndLocalIdentifier,
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.federalIdentifier
      )
    }
  ),
  local!pageConfig: rule!AS_GSS_updatePagingConfigurationForAddVendors(
    paging: null,
    isVmEnabled: local!isVmEnabled
  ),
  local!allVmVendorIdentifiers: rule!AS_GSS_UT_fetchAndFormatVmVendorIdentifiers(
    solicitationPiid: local!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber],
    isVendorLinked: false(),
    isSLGToggleOn: local!isSLGToggleOn,
    isVmEnabled: local!isVmEnabled
  ),
  local!searchAndFiltersMap: {},
  local!searchResultsMap: {},
  local!samGovStatusRefData: rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_GSM_GETDATA_samGovStatusRefData(),
  local!vendorAddressTypes: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getRefDataByTypes(
    refTypes: { cons!AS_GSS_REF_TYPE_VENDOR_ADDRESS }
  ),
  local!refStates: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getRefState(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  local!refCountries: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getRefCountry(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  local!isCreateVendorManually: false,
  local!manualVendorMap,
  local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!selectedVendorsMap
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v2"(
    titleBar: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headerTemplateSimple"(
      title: "Add Vendors",
      secondaryText: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        bundleKey: if(
          local!pageConfig.currentFormStep = local!pageConfig.formFirstPage,
          "ins_AddVendorsStep1",
          "ins_AddVendorsStep2"
        )
      )
    ),
    contentsWidth: "FULL",
    contents: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_addVendorSteps(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      pageConfig: local!pageConfig,
      vendorInfo: local!vendorInfo,
      evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
      isVmEnabled: local!isVmEnabled,
      evaluation: local!evaluationRecord,
      pagingInfo: local!vendorPagingInfo,
      isSLGToggleOn: local!isSLGToggleOn,
      defaultFactorId: local!defaultFactorId,
      evaluationVendors: local!evaluationVendors,
      selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
      uploadedTemporaryDocIds: ri!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
      allVmVendorIdentifiers: local!allVmVendorIdentifiers,
      evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: local!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors,
      searchAndFiltersMap: local!searchAndFiltersMap,
      searchResultsMap: local!searchResultsMap,
      samGovStatusRefData: local!samGovStatusRefData,
      vendorAddressTypes: local!vendorAddressTypes,
      refStates: local!refStates,
      refCountries: local!refCountries,
      isCreateVendorManually: local!isCreateVendorManually,
      manualVendorMap: local!manualVendorMap,
      triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
    ),
    buttons: rule!AS_GSS_BTN_buttonsForAddVendorForm(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      pageConfig: local!pageConfig,
      selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
      buttonAction: ri!buttonAction,
      isCreateVendorManually: local!isCreateVendorManually
    ),
    focusOnFirstInput:false()

  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)

  local!rawDetails: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!documetId),
    "",
    getcontentobjectdetailsbyid(ri!documetId)
  ),

    null()
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_UTIL_processDocumentName(docName: local!wholeName)
)

_a-0000ed40-2ea9-8000-9dec-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_searchAndSelectVendors
_a-0000ed40-2ea9-8000-9dec-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paneLayout"(
  showPaneDividers: true,
  panes: {
    /*Search page*/
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pane"(
      contents: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: "arrow-left"),
              " ",
              "Back to adding vendor submissions"
            },
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
              saveInto: a!save(
                ri!pageConfig,
                rule!AS_GSS_updatePagingConfigurationForAddVendors(
                  paging: ri!pageConfig,
                  isNextAction: false(),
                  isFormPage: false(),
                  isVmSwitch: true()
                )
              )
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          ),
          showWhen: ri!isVmEnabled
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_SEC_searchAndFilterVendorsFromSuite(
          bundle: ri!bundle,
          isSLGToggleOn: ri!isSLGToggleOn,
          searchResultsMap: ri!searchResultsMap,
          searchAndFiltersMap: ri!searchAndFiltersMap,
          samGovStatusRefData: ri!samGovStatusRefData
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_CPS_selectVendorsFromGSM(
          bundle: ri!bundle,
          evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
          isSLGToggleOn: ri!isSLGToggleOn,
          searchResultsMap: ri!searchResultsMap,
          selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
          existingVendors: ri!evaluationVendors,
          vendorAddressTypes: ri!vendorAddressTypes,
          refStates: ri!refStates,
          refCountries: ri!refCountries,
          searchAndFiltersMap: ri!searchAndFiltersMap,
          isCreateVendorManually: ri!isCreateVendorManually,
          manualVendorMap: ri!manualVendorMap,
          allVmVendorIdentifiers: ri!allVmVendorIdentifiers
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_CRD_noVendors(
          bundle: ri!bundle,
          isSLGToggleOn: ri!isSLGToggleOn,
          searchResultsMap: ri!searchResultsMap,
          searchAndFiltersMap: ri!searchAndFiltersMap,
          isCreateVendorManually: ri!isCreateVendorManually,
          manualVendorMap: ri!manualVendorMap
        )
      },
      showWhen: not(ri!pageConfig.showVmPage),
      accessibilityText: "Available Vendors"
    ),
    /*VM Integration Page*/
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pane"(
      contents: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorInfoFromIntegration(
        vendorInfo: ri!vendorInfo,
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        pageConfig: ri!pageConfig,
        selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
        pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
        isSLGToggleOn: ri!isSLGToggleOn,
        evaluationVendors: ri!evaluationVendors
      ),
      showWhen: ri!pageConfig.showVmPage,
      accessibilityText: "Available Vendors"
    ),
    /*Selected Vendors Panel*/
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pane"(
      contents: {
        rule!AS_GSS_CPS_displaySelectedRefVendorsToAdd(
          selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
          bundle: ri!bundle
        )
      },
      accessibilityText: "Selected Vendors",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    )
  }
)
